divs: Sighting Detailswas out watching fireworks when from the south west, came a low star like object very intence light. it had a red orb scout like object that would preceed the [star]! then come back close to main object. it was directly above my house! kids in the street observed it as well. lots of wows! it would cruze to the north then a few minuts later would come again from the same south west direction. it did this three times. completely amazing!
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Liberty
There was one other sighting in Liberty on or around July 4th 2012
